name: Turbulent Ocean Charge
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 WIND Fish, Sea Serpent, or Aqua-type monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, if a Fish, Sea Serpent, or Aqua-type monster is banished, all monsters you currently control gain 500 ATK until the end of the turn. You can only activate 1 "Turbulent Ocean Charge" per turn.
